Key Match Events: Josip Sutalo's botched clearance led to Ryan Christie scoring for Scotland in the 32nd minute.
Ivan Perisic's pin-point cutback resulted in Igor Matanovic scoring Croatia's equalizer in the 36th minute.
Andrej Kramaric headed in a 70th-minute winner for Croatia after a crisp volley from Borna Sosa was saved by Craig Gordon.
Che Adams thought he scored an equalizer in the 95th minute but was ruled offside after a VAR review.
Post-Match Reflections: Croatia are second in League A Group 1 with six points, level with leaders Portugal.
Scotland, who have suffered three defeats, remain bottom with no points.
